<p><strong>Nylon 66:</strong> synthetic polymer formed by chains of polyamides, similar to natural proteins. It is used in fabrics, brushes, and plastic parts.</p>

<a href="https://chemapps.stolaf.edu/jmol/jmol.php?script=Console&source=https://bioquanti.netlify.app/en/nivel/basico/jardim/virus.png">
  <img src="virus.png" alt="Vírus" style="max-width: 150px; height: auto;">
</a>
<p><strong>Vírus:</strong>  organized structures formed by proteins and genetic material. They are not considered complete living beings, but they can infect cells and replicate themselves.</p>
